title: HyperDocs Utilization Strategies for Digital-Based Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Blended class design considering smartphone-centric limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can design scientific experiment procedures with over 80% accuracy using hyperdocuments.
Learners can complete scientific reports incorporating peer feedback three or more times using digital collaboration tools.
Learners can integrate three or more types of multimedia materials (video/images/interactive elements) into mobile-optimized hyperdocuments.

resources: Open-Source Scientific Data Visualization Tools (e.g., Plotly)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
